metadata.synopsis: One liner for the animated armors that are inside Sorcerous Sundries (other than Klank). It should also take into account that this dialog can fire while the animated armor is unconcious due to having cast Dispel Magic.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Talk to one of the animated armors other than Klank in Sorcerous Sundries. CTY_Main_A  -17; 26; -88

0.speaker: Narrator
0.text: *The armour appears inanimate, though a spark of life force still radiates from the disjointed metal.*
0.context: NodeContext: Animated armour g eneric sound

1.speaker: Narrator
1.text: *The animated armour has reformed, unphased by its recent trip to oblivion.*
1.context: NodeContext: Animated armour g eneric sound

2.context: NodeContext: Animated armour g eneric sound
